subject: Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games (2014)
Cross-Country Skiing
Biathlon
lead_paragraph: Doping remains a scourge of endurance sports like cross-country skiing and biathlon, where testing and suspensions seem to be no match for temptation.
snippet: Doping remains a scourge of endurance sports like cross-country skiing and biathlon, where testing and suspensions seem to be no match for temptation.
